titles.title: This is just what Heaven means to me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A country where no twilight shadows deepen
Unending day where night will never be
A city where no storm clouds ever gather
This is just what Heaven means to m - e

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It's a place where there is no misunder - standing
And from all enmity and strife we're free
No unkind words to wound our hearts are spoken
This is just what Heaven means to m - e

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
What will it be when we get over yonder
And join the throng upon the glass - y sea
We'll join our loved ones and crown Christ forever
This is just what Heaven means to m - e

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And then at last I'll see the face of Jesus
And before whose image other loves all flee
Ah, but when they crown Him Lord of All I'll be there
This is just what Heaven means to m - e

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
What will it be when we get over yonder
And we'll join the throng upon the glass - y sea
We'll join our loved ones and crown Christ forever
This is just what Heaven means to m - e
